short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly clear all your browser cache with a single click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a simple extension that allows you to clear your cache with a single click of a button. You can either click the icon, or if you prefer, type in the browser address bar, "cache" => [hit the tab key] => "c" => [hit the enter key] to clear your cache. This extension uses the BrowsingData API which is supported by chrome versions 19+.
